info.name: LinkedIn - Midnight
info.description:
Dark theme for LinkedIn

Less eye strain, more networking.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 2.1.5 - Fixed up group pages and placeholders

Version 2.1.1 - Fixed search result font color, comment colors

Version 2.1 - Updated colors, feed no longer makes eyes bleed

data.title: Can you fix the font color inside the search box? Thanks.
text color fix in comment notifications
Good, but it look like a couple classes were changed and split view is missing some styling
